presets.name: Mr Mog
presets.author: ghostlyswat12 (UseTheLfgCoopChannel)
presets.description: from the mascot of the lfg coop channels Mr lfg guy.  so this characters name is Mr Mog and he was born mogging and never stopped through out his whole life he has mogged and now you too can mog along side him on his quest to become the elden lord will he obtain his goal and become THE MOGGED LORD Mr Mog wants to become the lord so he can help everyone mog and become the ultimate version of themselfs seems pretty noble to me WILL YOU HELP HIM MOG HIS WAS TO VICTORY

presets.description: you know her you love her its Sellen in all her glory become sellen and help her achive her gaols of helping herself... wait this makes no sense there cant be two of them erm hmm ok shes from a alternative world boom problem solded ahem anyways help her help her other self achive her gaols and also become elden lord why because why not she got nothing else to do

presets.name: Millicent

presets.description: You all know her and you all love her (besides dex build users ik what you did to her >: ) here she is in the flesh on a joruney in another world to discover her true nature and also help out herself from this alternative universe will she help herself and find her ture nature out... well thats up to you
